reviewText: Malcolm was a very misunderstood man, and this biography sheds some light on many things about him that society doesn't want or fail to understand.  this is an indepth look at one of the most controversial and brilliant leaders of our time.

I always learn from A&E Biography and was not disappointed in this one. The DVD was way expensive so I bought this one. Malcom was one of the most interesting people and lived a good & full life until his tragic murder.
